name: FOREVER (brokenportals)
description:
This is my second Bitsy game, and be warned, it contains a lot of religious themes and imagery that may or may not be offensive or disturbing to the viewer. It's also very long for a Bitsy game due to it being dialogue-centric. I wrote enough in it to almost have a short story. 

FOREVER is a game about a fate far worse than death.

The way the dialogue works:

"This is you speaking" - when  dialogue appears with quotations

*This is what's going on* when events are being described using asterisks.

They are speaking  - NPC dialogue without quotations

How to play: 

If your character starts from the left, move to the right side.

If your character starts bottom centre, move towards the point of interest, something that stands out.

Credits to:

Bitsy Game Maker by Adam Le Doux
